my-nft.title: My NFTs list
my-nft.description: Here you will find a list of the NFT you have purchased from the "{{pName}}" project
my-nft.alert_message: To get the benefits reserved for NFT owners, you must add your personal information on the Profile page. This is required to link your wallet to your physical identity.

me.title: Profile
me.description: Please add your personal information to access special offer as token owner

admin.title: Admin only page
admin.description: In this page is possible to retrieve personal informations, such as name, surname, email and phone number of the users that currently owns your NFTs. With this data you can contact them offchain and send coupon or discounts.

not-found.title: 404 - Not Found
not-found.content: Woops, the page yopu're looking for doesn't seem to exist. Please double check the URL and/or contact the site provider.

connect_wallet.title: Login with your wallet
connect_wallet.message: In order to see your NFTs you must connect your wallet with Metamask

modal.title: Privacy Policy
modal.description: Please accept the privacy policy to authorize your data usage before proceeding with the wallet connection

errors.invalid_psw: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one symbol and one number
errors.invalid_email: The provided mail is not valid
errors.invalid_phone: The provided phone number is not valid

errors.title: An error occurred
errors.api_call_failed: There was a problem with your request. please try again later
errors.auth_failed: Invalid username or password. Please try again later
errors.token_expired: Session expired. Please try again later
errors.not_found: The requested data can't be found, please try again later
errors.cant_disconnect: Can't disconnect wallet, please try again later
errors.unsupported_blockchain: The selected blockchain isn't supported yet
